mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, user_idennum, user_password, user_gender, user_email, department_id, user_phone, user_photo, user_name, user_address_postnum, user_address_basic, user_address_detail, user_email_token, user_email_verified, user_email_token_generated_date) values (#{userId}, #{userIdennum}, #{userPassword}, #{userGender}, #{userEmail}, #{departmentName}, #{userPhone}, #{userPhoto}, #{userName}, #{userAddressPostnum}, #{userAddressBasic}, #{userAddressDetail}, #{userEmailCheckToken}, #{userEmailVerified}, #{userEmailCheckTokenGeneratedAt})
mapper.select: select case when exists(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE user_email = #{email}) then 'true' else 'false' end
select case when exists(SELECT 1 FROM users WHERE user_idennum = #{userIdennum}) then 'true' else 'false' end

SELECT user_id AS userId, user_idennum AS userIdennum, user_password AS userPassword, user_gender AS userGender, user_email AS userEmail, department.department_name AS departmentName, user_phone AS userPhone, user_photo AS userPhoto, user_position as userPosition, user_role AS userRole, user_name AS userName, user_address_postnum AS userAddressPostnum, user_address_basic AS userAddressBasic, user_address_detail AS userAddressDetail, user_createddate AS userCreatedDate, user_moddate AS userModDate, user_email_token AS userEmailCheckToken, user_email_verified AS userEmailVerified, user_email_token_generated_date AS userEmailCheckTokenGeneratedAt FROM users INNER JOIN department ON users.department_id = department.department_id WHERE user_idennum = #{value}

SELECT user_idennum AS userIdennum, user_name AS userName, department.department_name AS departmentName, user_photo AS userPhoto from users inner join department on users.department_id = department.department_id order by department_name desc

SELECT user_idennum AS userIdennum, user_gender AS userGender, user_email AS userEmail, department.department_name AS departmentName, users.DEPARTMENT_ID as departmentId, user_position as userPosition, user_name AS userName, user_createddate AS userCreatedDate, user_phone as userPhone, user_position as userPosition, user_address_basic as userAddressBasic, user_address_detail as userAddressDetail FROM users inner join department on users.department_id = department.department_id
SELECT department_id as departmentId, department_name as departmentName from department
mapper.update: update users set user_email = #{userEmail}, user_phone = #{userPhone}, user_photo = #{userPhoto}, user_address_postnum = #{userAddressPostnum}, user_address_basic = #{userAddressBasic}, user_address_detail = #{userAddressDetail} where user_idennum = #{userIdennum}
